Name: Vocal Space Shooter
About the game: A game to feel and interact A game where the player uses the musical notes and decibels of his voice to play Vocal Space Shooter brings a deep feeling with the piano sound An experimental way of using musical interact in games We hope you enjoy Features: *Vocal Inputs *Musical Interaction *Piano Sounds *Physics-based game *Amazing effects and Colors *Deep Space
